desc: Go chemical-free with our eco-friendly cleaning cloths from kitchen cloth, bathroom cloth, glass cleaning cloth, & stainless steel cloth, to dusters, & microfibre mops. Equipped with precision-engineered fibers designed to work brilliantly with just water for every surface. Smarter, healthier, & simpler cleaning.

layout.text: E-Cloth: The Eco Way To Clean

We’ve made a smarter, healthier, and simpler way to clean. You can drop the disposables and cut the chemical cleaners, E-Cloth will remove dust, dirt, and grime with the purest compound on earth: Water. In a world full of excess, E-Cloth is enough.
